text: Palsang Lama is an Indian-born Nepalese professional footballer who plays as a defender for Minerva Punjab in the I-League. ==Career== He was born in India, and he started his football career from United sikkim football club(Sikkim),Calcutta Football League for the side Tollygunge Agragami. On 13 January 2017 he made his professional debut in the Indian I-League with Minerva Punjab against Aizawl. He started and played 52 minutes as Minerva Punjab lost 1–0. ==References== == External links == * Goal Nepal Profile Profile. title: Palsang Lama
